creator: j.santosh.shenoy@gmail.com
text:
We are getting the below exception for the Jmeter scripts from past few days in blazemeter. These scripts were running all the while before without any issues. 
We have seen similar error locally when java version in our machine was upgraded 

Error response message 
Non HTTP response code: javax.net.ssl.SSLPeerUnverifiedException 
Non HTTP response message: peer not authenticated

Is there any fix or this issue?

I have tried adding http request defaults and setting it to java as well as seen in some forums.
I tried with 2.7,2.9 and 2.10 as well, but it all gives this error
creator: j.santosh.shenoy@gmail.com

text:
Can you provide more details about your test plan?
What does it do exactly ?
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please ask question on blazemeter support and then if related to jmeter ask on user mailing list.
